sentences.sentence: The dilogarithm is an integral of the logarithm.
sentences.translation: 二重对数是对数的积分。

sentences.sentence: It calculates the logarithm of 1 plus its argument.
sentences.translation: 它计算1的对数和参数(1 p表示“加1”)。

sentences.sentence: This plots the logarithm to base 10 of the values on the axis.
sentences.translation: 此命令在轴上绘制以10为底的值的对数。
